page.title: 11THE FAMILY OF LISA
page.content: There are five people living in the house.They are my Mom, Dad, sister, my sister's baby and me.The baby is the only one younger than I.My sister is eighteen years old and married but her husband lives with his Mom.No one in the house is working. My sister takes her baby around the town every day. My Mom does the cooking,cleaning and washing. My Mom gets up before me but Dad stays in bed until 10.30a.m. He likes to watch Scrabble and cartoons on the T.V. but my Mom likes to watch Coronation Street and my sister watches Crossroads. I like to watch anything.My nephew just lies on the floor or in his pram,gurgling or eating or sleeping.My Dad likes gardening and talking and, somtimes, my Mom takes me to the cinema. I had a rabbit but he had to be put down by the vet. I have no pets now.
